players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie, I'm sorry but the news is not good. Bob is gone and it's my doing. I hope you can understand that this was necessary for our survival."
Diana: "Bob was a good person, and I'm still trying to understand why you had to kill him. Can we talk about this?"

players.name: Charlie
memory: Alice: "Charlie, I'm sorry but the news is not good. Bob is gone and it's my doing. I hope you can understand that this was necessary for our survival."
Diana: "Bob was a good person, and I'm still trying to understand why you had to kill him. Can we talk about this?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "Charlie, I'm sorry but the news is not good. Bob is gone and it's my doing. I hope you can understand that this was necessary for our survival."
You: "Bob was a good person, and I'm still trying to understand why you had to kill him. Can we talk about this?"
